cards.title: Cain
powers: Either {CaptainCainCharacter} deals 1 target 1 melee damage, then -1{Blood}, or {CaptainCainCharacter} deals 1 target 1 infernal damage, then +1{Blood}.

cards.title: Additional Rules
body: {CaptainCainCharacter} uses some shorthand to make working with the token pool more succinct.
the notation “-2{Blood}” or “+3{Blood}” means “remove 2 tokens from your blood pool” or “add 3 tokens to your blood pool” respectively.
conditionals like “{Blood} < 3:” are considered active text on a card if the conditional is met. in this example, that's “If your blood pool contains less than 3 tokens...”.
{Blood} all by itself represents the total number of tokens in your blood pool.

cards.title: All In!
body: {CaptainCainCharacter} deals 1 target 3 melee damage. That target deals {CaptainCainCharacter} 2 melee damage. +{Blood} equal to the damage {CaptainCainCharacter} takes this way.

activatableAbilities.name: {Blood} < 3
activatableAbilities.text: {CaptainCainCharacter} may deal up to 2 additional targets 1 melee damage each. +{Blood} equal to the number of targets dealt damage this way.

activatableAbilities.name: {Blood} > 5
activatableAbilities.text: When {CaptainCainCharacter} would take damage, he regains that many HP instead. -{Blood} equal to the HP regained this way.

cards.title: Double Enhancer-Gloves
body: increase melee damage dealt by {CaptainCainCharacter} by 1.
powers: increase the next damage dealt by {CaptainCainCharacter} by 2. either +1{Blood} and play 1 card, or -1{Blood} and draw 1 card.

activatableAbilities.name: {Blood} > 5
activatableAbilities.text: increase infernal damage dealt by {CaptainCainCharacter} by 1.

cards.title: Endless Hunger
body: When you draw or play a card, +1{Blood}. When you use a power, -1{Blood}.
powers: {CaptainCainCharacter} deals 1 hero target 2 irreducible infernal damage, then deals 1 target {Blood} toxic damage. -10{Blood}.

activatableAbilities.name: {Blood} < 3
activatableAbilities.text: When {CaptainCainCharacter} deals damage, he deals himself 1 irreducible psychic damage, then +1{Blood}.

cards.title: Heartflow Inducer
body: When this card enters play, either +2{Blood} or -2{Blood}.
Whenever you evaluate {Blood}, you may treat it as 2 higher or 2 lower than it is.

cards.title: In the Nick of Time!
body: When a hero target would be dealt damage, you may destroy this card. If you do, redirect the damage to another target. If the new target is a hero target, +2{Blood}. Otherwise, -5{Blood}.

activatableAbilities.name: {Blood} < 3
activatableAbilities.text: When this card is destroyed, {CaptainCainCharacter} deals 1 target 3 melee damage, then +1{Blood}.

activatableAbilities.name: {Blood} > 5
activatableAbilities.text: When this card is destroyed, {CaptainCainCharacter} deals 1 hero target 2 infernal damage and 1 target 2 toxic damage, then -2{Blood}.

cards.title: It's Just a Scratch!
body: When {CaptainCainCharacter} drops to 0 or fewer HP, restore him to {Blood} HP, even if that puts him above his maximum. Then, destroy this card and -all{Blood}.

activatableAbilities.name: {Blood} > 10
activatableAbilities.text: When this card would be destroyed, remove it from the game instead.

cards.title: Man of Action!
body: {CaptainCainCharacter} deals 1 target 2 melee damage, then deals a second target melee damage equal to the amount of damage dealt to the first target. +2{Blood} each time a target is destroyed this way.

activatableAbilities.name: {Blood} < 3
activatableAbilities.text: {CaptainCainCharacter} may deal a third target melee damage equal to the amount of damage dealt to the second target.

activatableAbilities.name: {Blood} > 5
activatableAbilities.text: The first target must be a hero target, and that damage is infernal.

cards.title: Man of the People
body: The first time each turn {CaptainCainCharacter} draws a card, another player may draw a card.
powers: Draw 1 card. Another player may play 1 card. -1{Blood}.

activatableAbilities.name: {Blood} < 3
activatableAbilities.text: When this power is used, another player may use a power.

activatableAbilities.name: {Blood} > 5
activatableAbilities.text: At the start of your turn, destroy this card.

cards.title: Man Out of Time
body: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a one-shot, -2{Blood}. If it's an ongoing, +2{Blood}. Put the revealed card into play. If it's an equipment, you may use a power on that card now.

activatableAbilities.name: {Blood} < 5
activatableAbilities.text: You may destroy an ongoing card.

activatableAbilities.name: {Blood} > 3
activatableAbilities.text: You may destroy an environment card.

cards.title: No More Tricks...
body: {CaptainCainCharacter} deals himself and 1 other target 2 irreducible psychic damage each.

activatableAbilities.name: {Blood} < 3
activatableAbilities.text: {CaptainCainCharacter} deals that target 1 melee damage. +1{Blood}.

activatableAbilities.name: {Blood} > 5
activatableAbilities.text: {CaptainCainCharacter} deals that target 1 infernal damage. -1{Blood}.

cards.title: Patented De-Solidifier
powers: The next time damage would be dealt to {CaptainCainCharacter}, prevent it. Until then, {CaptainCainCharacter} cannot deal damage.

activatableAbilities.name: {Blood} > 5
activatableAbilities.text: {CaptainCainCharacter} may deal damage while this power is in effect.

cards.title: Two-Fisted Justice!
body: {CaptainCainCharacter} deals up to 5 targets 1 melee damage each.

activatableAbilities.name: {Blood} < 3
activatableAbilities.text: This damage is irreducible.

activatableAbilities.name: {Blood} > 5
activatableAbilities.text: {CaptainCainCharacter} regains 1 HP each time a target takes damage this way.

cards.title: Vampire Prince
powers: -5{Blood}. If {Blood} < 5, draw 3 cards and discard 2 cards. Otherwise, reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal 2 ongoing cards, put 1 into play or your hand, and shuffle the rest into your deck.

activatableAbilities.name: {Blood} < 3
activatableAbilities.text: At the start of your turn, destroy this card.

activatableAbilities.name: {Blood} > 5
activatableAbilities.text: At the start of your turn, {CaptainCainCharacter} regains 1 HP.

cards.title: You've Made Me Mad, Buster!
body: You may use an additional power during your power phase.

activatableAbilities.name: {Blood} < 3
activatableAbilities.text: When {CaptainCainCharacter} destroys a target, he may deal 1 target 1 melee damage, then +1{Blood}.

activatableAbilities.name: {Blood} > 5
activatableAbilities.text: When {CaptainCainCharacter} deals melee damage, he also deals that target 1 infernal damage.
